scripts.init:server:local: docker run -d -it -w /app -u app --entrypoint sh --name server --volume ./src:/app/src server:local
scripts.run:server:local: docker exec -w /app -u app -it server sh -c "pnpm monitor"
scripts.orm:generate:container: docker exec -w /app -u app -it server node_modules/.bin/prisma generate --schema schema.docker.prisma
scripts.orm:pull:container: docker exec -w /app -u app -it server node_modules/.bin/prisma db pull --schema ./schema.docker.prisma
scripts.docker:network:connect:database: docker network connect local postgres || true
